title: Development of biomaterial composite hydrogel as a passive sampler with potential application in wastewater-based surveillance
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Orlando de la Rosa, Alberto Aguayo-Acosta, Hiram Martín Valenzuela-Amaro, Edgar Ricardo Meléndez-Sánchez, Juan Eduardo Sosa-Hernández, Roberto Parra-Saldívar
